name: Ice Golem
description: The Ice Golem is a large construct made of ice, designed as a guardian in frigid environments. Its towering figure is composed of solidified ice, with a chilling aura that reflects its cold nature.
memorable: Notable for its ability to grapple foes and preserve them within its icy core, effectively incapacitating them.
goals: To guard and protect its designated area or master by incapacitating intruders.
relations: Typically encountered in icy terrain or near other constructs or guardians.
environment: Usually found in cold, icy environments, serving as a protector in such regions.
strengths: Immunity to cold, poison, and psychic damage, along with resistances to various conditions; strong physical attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, which can liquefy its ice cavity and disrupt its abilities.
attacks: Uses powerful slam attacks dealing bludgeoning and cold damage, and can grapple medium or smaller creatures.
most_powerful_ability: Preserve Creature ability allows it to freeze and incapacitate enemies, maintaining them within its icy body.
skills: Has a low passive perception of 13, indicating it is not very aware.
additional_information: Can liquefy and freeze its Ice Cavity to control trapped creatures.
Possesses Immutable Form, making it immune to form-altering spells.
Magic Resistance grants it an advantage on saving throws against spells.
test_queries: large ice guardian with freezing abilities
construct that grapples and preserves enemies
ice creature with powerful slam attacks
golem immune to cold and poison
cold damaging monster that immobilizes foes
